item.title: The Autarchist Manifesto
item.description: â€œWe do not seek chaos, nor submit to imposed order.â€ â€œWe build inner harmony and radiate it as a quiet force.â€ 1. We are not anarchists. We are not statists. We are autarchists. We embrace personal sovereignty without domination or submission. 2. Autarchy begins within. Self-mastery is the source of external freedom. There is no liberty without responsibility. 3. Consent is sacred. All systems rooted in coercion are illegitimate.
